Text.Language: Ariv~meui~ P[oic n~n/ethejhwj qen niy~li'ic nem nia~nagk/: nahmou e~bolqen nouhojhej t/rou.
Remember, O Lord, those who suffer hardship in afflictions and distresses; save them from all their hardships.
